project: ALIVE Coach – AI Fitness & Lifestyle Agent

sprint.title: 1-Hour Sprint – Core Foundation
sprint.goal: Set up the initial backend structure and AI interaction prompt logic to serve one user end-to-end for Day 1.
deliverables: sample_user_data.sql – Insert for 1 mock user (Day 1 scenario)
README.md – Setup and next sprint plan

tasks.title: Data Schema Setup
tasks.description: Create schema definitions for core MVP tables: users, daily_logs, workout_sessions, health_metrics, ai_interactions.

tasks.title: Smart Prompt Design
tasks.description: Write first draft of 3 AI interaction prompts for Day 1 Welcome, Post-sleep Low Energy, and Workout Feedback scenarios.

tasks.title: Mock Data Insert
tasks.description: Insert mock data for one test user including bio, mood, sleep, cycle phase, and workout plan.

tasks.title: Wrap & Review
tasks.description: Write README, export schema image, summarize sprint progress.

bonus: Set up a SQLite local DB and test inserts
Run mock prompt with GPT for mood-based recommendation
next_sprint_ideas: Connect schema to lightweight Python API
Build /coach endpoint to simulate prompt & response
success_criteria: Can simulate one full Day 1 interaction
Data structure supports fitness + emotional + biometric context
Prompt system matches user rhythm and offers clear next step
